con:testCase.name: GoodCase-manualCharging-Amount-2and4-DP
con:testCase.con:description: Tests amounts with special values and 2 or 4 decimal values.

con:request.name: manualPayment-charge
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:manualPayment> <manualPaymentData> <!--type: string--> <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</msisdn> <amount>${DataSource-Amounts#amount_newOCS}</amount> <balanceType>${#[TestSuite-DEV-ChargeCustomer]#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <comment>Different amounts with 2 and 4 decimal points.</comment> </manualPaymentData> </v1:manualPayment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: manualPayment-deduct
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:manualPayment>\r <manualPaymentData>\r <!--type: string-->\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</msisdn>\r <!--type: int-->\r <amount>-${DataSource-Amounts#amount_newOCS}</amount>\r <!--type: string-->\r <balanceType>${#[TestSuite-DEV-ChargeCustomer]#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType>\r <comment>Different amounts with 2 and 4 decimal points.</comment>\r <deductToTheMax>true</deductToTheMax>\r </manualPaymentData>\r </v1:manualPayment>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
